import React from "react"; import Projectnav from "./Projectnav"; import MarvelMovie from "./MarvelMovie"; class MarvelSelector extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.resultPrint = this.resultPrint.bind(this) } resultPrint = () => { let results = Array.from(document.getElementsByClassName('selectedMovie')); let resultsArray = results.map (a => a.outerHTML) for (let i =0; i < resultsArray.length; i++) { resultsArray[i] = resultsArray[i].replace('selectedMovie', 'selectedResult'); } document.getElementsByClassName('resultsGrid')[0].innerHTML = resultsArray; } render() { return (
